paragraph # <p>Grunt is a command line tool that's running tasks for you. It can automate all the things you have to do manually (at least many of them).</p> 
Usage:Standard paragraph

Grunt is a command line tool that's running tasks for you. It can automate all the things you have to do manually (at least many of them).
